storyInfo: Fortuna's halo grows dull, and Oren shows up at the monastery. Meanwhile, Lemuen is chanced by a freak attack.

attributes.content: The sensation is hard to describe.
There's a strange itch on her forehead. The halo atop her crown flickers with no rhyme or reason.
Her view begins, gradually, to dim.
Yes, Fortuna can see the wrinkled abbot's incredulous gaze, and hear the noise of the onlooking crowd.
But she attempts to feel the old man's mind, as she may have done every time before, and yet his emotions no longer drift their way into her soul, not even a hint or trace—
She cannot sense the other Sankta.
She is no longer one amongst them.
Fallen...?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: What's the meaning of this...? What's happening to Fortuna? Is—Is she sick?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I'll explain on the way back. First, we handle the pressing matters here—
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Avus Stefano!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Save Fina! I'm begging you, save her, hurry!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Child, do not panic. Tell me clearly... what is it that happened?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Fina—Fina was bleeding everywhere, and I couldn't stop it... I couldn't find anyone to help...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: It was—It was just a dumb fight—Fina wanted my patron firearm—I should have just given it to her—why didn't I give it to her?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: It's all my fault...!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Fear not, fear not, child. There is naught to fear.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: As informed by present circumstances, I would consider this a case of accidental injury with no subjective intent to harm.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Silence! Executor!
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: You would accuse this child... of aggrieving her own kin?!
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: How can your finger know to lay such blame—?!
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: It is the most rational assumption.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Rejection by the Commandments is not insurmountable. Unintentional discharges are particularly common.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The sheer drivel!
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: No... he's right... it was me, I pulled the trigger!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Fortuna! No, you...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Avus Stefano, it was my fault! I'll take it however they punish me!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: But Fina's still... She's been hurt! Please, you have to save her!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Fine, fine, I'll see to it now—
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I'll go.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I'm good with first aid. Give me a location.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Just—Just go to my room...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I can show you the way!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: If you would, Clément.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Less talk, more action. Move.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: This way! Follow me!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Here, right here!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: The door's wide open...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Oh, the blood...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Delfina!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Quiet down! You want everyone to hear about this?!
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Move, let me work!
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: No. She's in bad shape. Bleeding's too profuse.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: And her wound is...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: What do we do now?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Flowers... right! I remember His Excellency saying the sacrarium's flowers could be used for healing! Yes, right, they have to be...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Wait while I pick some!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Don't bother.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Let me go! If I—If I leave right now, we might still make it—
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: There's no point! Even if we stop the bleeding, we're out of time!
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: What? How can there be no point...?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Because there isn't one.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: She was shot point blank. Severe loss of blood. I can't detect breathing.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I've tried first aid. Nothing. I couldn't get a pulse.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: No breath... and no pulse...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: It's very likely she was taken instantly.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: The girl is dead.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I've locked the entrance. No one was around, fortunately. We can't have many eyewitnesses.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: How are we handling this?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: We wait for Serpilia to conclude treatment.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Halo discoloration is characteristic of a fallen angel. She is falling rapidly.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: With consideration for stability within the monastery, this is my suggestion: cancel the sermon and lock down all news of this.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I have a proposal.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: In order to avert unnecessary conflict, I and my colleagues will take over patrol duty for the following interim.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: All inhabitants should return to their rooms as soon as possible, and await final verdict tomorrow.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: This will ensure to the maximum extent that there are no further accidents.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Reverend Executor, this abbey is not under Lateran jurisdiction until it arrives at its final destination!
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I am aware.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: We can address any problems within the monastery on our own. We wouldn't hassle our Lateran visitors.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: As you so rightly indicated, Reverend Executor, this was simply an accident. Given we still don't know Delfina's condition, this could all be a false alarm...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Accident or not, she has fallen.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: It is mandatory that issues of fallen angels are assessed and addressed personally by His Holiness and the Sacred College of Cardinals.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: So you want to take her back to Laterano. Not that I've once seen a two-horned Sankta in Laterano, not ever!
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Tell me, Reverend Executor, how can her being 'addressed' inspire trust in me?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Well... Federico, I'm just mentioning this, but didn't His Holiness tell you to keep an eye on how often you contradict people?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: What? I am not manifesting any contradiction.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Err, okay. I mean... um, your approach could be a little more conciliatory...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I do not understand your meaning.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But thank you for the suggestion.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You... *sigh* I'll take it.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I think... we're not going to get anywhere arguing about it here. Seeing as we can't leave for now anyway, we might want to find a place for, um, Seniora Fortuna here to catch her breath for a while.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Once we have the situation under control, and everyone's calmed down somewhat, we'll still have plenty of time to discuss how exactly we resolve this.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: And, Most Reverend Abbot, you don't have to be so wary of Laterano. Similar cases have happened before. As long as we're sure the Commandments weren't violated with malice, the punishment should be light, at most.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Right, Federico?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Correct. But you did not have the authority to divulge that information, Richele.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Look, special circumstances.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Just, the both of you, consider it?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I have no objection.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I worry...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: ...Avus Stefano, don't...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: It was my fault... Whatever the punishment is, I'll accept it...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Fortuna!
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I'll go with you, Senior...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Then we're decided.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I'll find Seniora Fortuna somewhere to rest. You two stay here for the moment and calm down.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: This room looks good enough. Err... very spacious to boot.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Don't worry too much. Your case is a relatively special one, and I imagine His Holiness will get personally involved. As long as there wasn't intent to harm, it shouldn't end up too severe.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Fina's...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Is Fina, um... the wounded Sankta citizen?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: We still can't be sure of her condition, but my colleague should be treating her now. Let's think positive—things may not be that bad.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: My horns...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I wonder why I'm growing...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Horns like a Sarkaz's...?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Well, that, I'm not too sure myself... In any case, someone will tell you once we're in Laterano.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: For now, just rest up here.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: ...Okay.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I'll be outside the door. If you need anything, just knock for me.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: *sigh*... Who knows how Federico's going to handle this.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You know what? I am a pretty sensitive guy, if I'm being honest. I always get this cold sweat when someone's creeping around behind me.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: The fun's over. Come out, Oren.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Just one question—how'd you see me?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I was just bluffing, actually. I didn't think you would come out.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You're not expecting me to believe that, are you?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Why not? I'm good either way.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Whatever, Richele, you little cheat.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Don't say that. I'm more honest than Serpilia, at least.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: She's one of yours, isn't she? She was lying.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: No... not outright, I guess. She just declined to say everything.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Where is this coming from?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: We were asking her about her relation to you. All she effectively said was 'I couldn't care less about him' without revealing anything else.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: She was dodging Federico's questions.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: And that's your entire reason for saying she was lying? Don't you think that's a weird conclusion?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I think having the same skill under my belt helps. Besides, look at the situation here. It's easy to guess how you'd act, and I'd also guess Federico's guessed.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: There's no winning with you.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Plan A should've been dragging him off for drinks, after all.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Followed by him carting you back to the Lateran?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: This monastery's guests have more swagger than you think. Can't say Federico would care to wrangle me once it's all going down.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Sounds like trouble really is brewing here.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: So, Oren, what are you and Serpilia planning exactly?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Once you hear me out, are you gonna help me?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Thaaat... remains to be seen.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I'd have to hear the answer first to decide.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Federico, I've got bad news.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Uh... wait, is there anyone with you?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Richele is not here.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Who cares about him!
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I mean... is that Fortuna kid with you?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: No. Richele escorted her to her accommodations.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: If you have discovered anything, please inform me. I require confirmation of the aggrieved citizen's condition.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Fine. Then I'll give it to you straight—we were too late.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Confirmed deceased?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Confirmed. It was a fatal gunshot wound. Barring a true miracle, she's not coming back to life.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Oh, and the guy with me called Clément. He said he was going to pick some flowers, and I didn't care. I let him go.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: He was out of his mind when he left...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Flowers?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Per the intel. The abbey's specialty. Not many left right now, I gather, and that's not important.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: The whole was an accident, Federico. The girl wasn't lying. Accidental discharge. It might not... be all that severe...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: His Holiness will judge.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Sure... I mean, even Mostima flies with him. I'm sure Our Holiness will forgive with wide arms just like always.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I'll contact Richele in a bit—I'm sure he misses being free range. It'll be me watching the girl. I won't let her run off.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: As for how Lemuen and Oren are doing...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Has Oren Argiolas made contact with you?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Am I under suspicion here?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: By my judgment, yes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Oren's movements were not placed under any restrictions. Failure to contact the Lateran is conduct of his own subjective.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The Sarkaz are involved in these affairs. I conjecture Oren would not immediately leave. If he wanted all leeway for operation, it would require finding a collaborator.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: And so you suspect me... But what about Richele? No thoughts about him?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Richele does not have as ample time to act alone as you do. His level of suspicion ranks below yours.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hahaha. You're a smart cookie, Federico.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Here's my comment: no comment. All guesses here are yours. I haven't said a thing.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Good? Good. I'll be in touch.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, is the Abbot there?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Uh... are you going to relay the news to him?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: That is unnecessary.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: He has heard it.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: ...Delfina...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I must see for myself. I need to... see the child...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Your Excellency may act freely.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: However, Serpilia would not misjudge. I do not recommend spending additional time on reconfirming.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I am tentatively assuming Oren Argiolas is still aboard, and has some sort of scheme.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I must now ascertain in detail all movements he made prior to his disappearance staying at this monastery, as well as all recent absences and returns of monastery personnel. I ask you comply.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Reverend Executor, what is necessity to you? What line do you draw between the necessary and unnecessary?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Can you truly not hear your kin lamenting? Does emotion truly mean nothing in your mind?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I will not deny that.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: And should that be, you are no worthy harbinger of Paradise.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: And should you represent Laterano...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Laterano is no worthy shepherd of my faith.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Please answer my questions, Your Excellency: Has Oren acted abnormally in any way within the monastery? Have any other people lodged recently at the monastery?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: My words are wasted on you.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Do as you will, Reverend Executor.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Finished...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Trust him to use up every last page of a notebook this thick.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Lemuen heaves a sigh, and closes the antique plain colored notebook shut.
Her fingers trace over the nicks and scrapes that decorate the cover, each one hiding a story of its own.
If back then...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Oh, what am I thinking?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Right, now then... Hm, it's time I got to work myself.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: With Serpilia's group already here, I can't keep on dawdling.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Is someone outside? If you're looking for me, you can come right in.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Well, well, that's not a guest I'd expect.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Sorry, visitor, but you came at a bad time—I don't have any tea to offer you.
attributes.name: Lemuen
